#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main(){
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
        char s[100];
        cin>>s;
        int count = 0;
        int len = strlen(s);
        for(int i=0; i<len; i++){
            if(s[i]=='Q'||s[i]=='D'||s[i]=='A'||s[i]=='P'||s[i]=='O'||s[i]=='R')
                count++;
            else if(s[i]=='B')
                count+=2;
        }
        cout<<count<<endl;
    }

}
